resources.string:
❗Important Notes:
 - This App uses Pixabay API as its image source.
 - For developers:
Please replace the API_KEY in `${Project_Root_Directory}/secrets.defaults.properties` with your Pixabay API key.
 - For non-developers:
Ensure that your App Apk is sourced from github.com/azrael8576/picquest, specifically from the apk in the project's Releases.
 
 ⚠️Known Issues:
 - Currently, this project does not use any local storage solution.
 - The recent search keywords is stored at the Screen level, meaning that the keywords will be cleared when you navigate back to the top page.
